name: BirB (ToddDickinson)
description:
BirB was created for the 2019 Global Game Jam. The theme was "What Home means to you".  Home is different for everybody, because everybody has experienced home differently. That's how we came to the conclusion that home is really just an accumulation of experiences. We attempt to simulate that idea by allowing you to collect objects to build your home. Also, you can learn a few bird facts if you want.

Credits: 

Anderson Fischer - Systems and Feel Design

Dakota Stoner - Level Design, UI Programmer/Design

Jack Melcher - Art, Design

Todd Dickinson - Programmer, Level/Gameplay Designer

Living Birds by DINOPUNCH on the Unity Asset Store

Fantasy Skybox Free by G.E. Team on the Unity Asset Store

Outline Effect by CAKESLICE on the Unity Asset Store

Strong Wind Blowing by DontMind8 on OpenGameArt.org

Flight Script adapted from Unity-Free-Flight by NickolausDS
